item.description:
See Messages ?> Cancellation Policy

Please be on time.

Once done with Sniffing Hello our four legged friends are pretty eager to get walking.
Delays usually mean tangled leashes games for their 2 legged friends .

Thank You Rita for the directions you provided the group.

DIRECTIONS The entrance to Pulpit Rock trail is on New Boston Rd.
It is approx 3.5 miles past the intersection of Wallace/New Boston rd on the left, just after Esther Rd.

Coming from Manchester start slowing down when you pass Pulpit Rd on your right. Esther Drive will be about 500' after on the left and the next left after that is the entrance to the parking area. The sign is made of wood and surrounded with green growth? easy to miss.

If you pass the Town Marker of New Bedford? you've gone too far!!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the parking lot - look for my Golden Retriever Hugo & the puppy mobile: green Volvo Station Wagon with NH eprint plates. Meetup Sign will be displayed in the car.
item.why: An enchanting trail with board walks, a little climbing, lots of tree roots? a little challenging but well worth the effort.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Pulpit Rock - Bedford, NH
